definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: circumcise, weaken (si vera l.; cf. NH [[מָהַל]] circumcise, Aram. [[מְהַל]] id.);—only fig.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[סָבְאֵח מָהוּל בַּמָָּיִם]] Is 1:22 thy choice wine weakened with water, so Thes De Che:Comm Di Du; cf. vinum castrare, Plin:xix. 53: Ba:Erkl. d. Jes. Che:Hpt (cf. Nö:ZMG xl.1886, 741) comp. NH [[מוהל]], juice (of fruit, esp. olives); Ar. muhlun oil, liquid pitch, suppurating matter; v. against this Di.
